name: Barmy Builders
overview: Frank the Foreman collects falling pound notes to pay his workers to build a new house. His arch rival Evil Eric is after him. Avoid the Eric, dodge the darts and grab the cash that will allow you to build your house. Use the balloons to quickly get to the top of the platform quickly and slide quickly down to escape the threats that come after you. Was released as Brick Layer in Italy's Peek n.11 (novembre 1985).
